div.h2: Information About How We Ship Your Order
div.p: We ship world wide. Delivery costs calculated at checkout. From Australia, Europe, UK or Asia? Change store

p.span: When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

SASMAR understands that customers rely on discreet shipping, and complete discretion for payments, when ordering from this website. That is why every precaution possible has been taken to ensure customer privacy. All orders are shipped in discreet generic brown boxes with a standard shipping label. The sender will be listed on the parcel as "FULLFILLMENT CENTER" with no reference to this website. There is never anything on the outside of the package that could suggest what the contents are. We have been shipping products discreetly world wide since 2001.

We can ship to virtually any address in the world however SASMAR is NOT responsible for any clearance delays, custom costs, import costs for importation into countries outside of Europe, Australia, Hong Kong, United States and the United Kingdom where we do not have a warehouse. You accept full responsibility for any problems that may occur in your country and agree to hold SASMAR harmless in the event that the order is not delivered due to a customs clearance issue. We are experienced in shipping orders globally and will do everything we can to help ensure your order is delivered to you.

div.p:
Los Angeles (United States)
Pennsylvania (United States)
Sydney (Australia)
Hong Kong (Hong Kong)
London (United Kingdom)

p.span: Due to the personal nature of SASMAR products returns are NOT accepted. Please choose carefully as we are not permitted to accept product returns should you change your mind after your order has been shipped. If you have any questions or need help to select the product that best suits your requirements please contact us using the contact us page on this website.
This returns policy is designed to ensure that every product shipped is in new condition and has been cleared by our quality control department.
